metadata.title: Ensure that the seccomp profile is set to docker/default in your pod definitions
metadata.description: Ensure that the seccomp profile is set to docker/default in your pod definitions

metadata.title: Ensure Image Vulnerability Scanning using GCR Container Analysis or a third party provider
metadata.description: Ensure Image Vulnerability Scanning using GCR Container Analysis or a third party provider

metadata.title: Ensure GKE clusters are not running using the Compute Engine default service account
metadata.description: Ensure GKE clusters are not running using the Compute Engine default service account

metadata.title: Ensure Kubernetes Secrets are encrypted using keys managed in Cloud KMS
metadata.description: Ensure Kubernetes Secrets are encrypted using keys managed in Cloud KMS

metadata.title: Ensure legacy Compute Engine instance metadata APIs are Disabled
metadata.description: Ensure legacy Compute Engine instance metadata APIs are Disabled

metadata.title: Ensure the GKE Metadata Server is Enabled
metadata.description: Ensure the GKE Metadata Server is Enabled

metadata.title: Ensure Container-Optimized OS (cos_containerd) is used for GKE node images
metadata.description: Ensure Container-Optimized OS (cos_containerd) is used for GKE node images

metadata.description: Ensure Node Auto-Repair is enabled for GKE nodes

metadata.description: Ensure Node Auto-Upgrade is enabled for GKE nodes

metadata.description: Ensure Shielded GKE Nodes are Enabled

metadata.description: Ensure Integrity Monitoring for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled

metadata.description: Ensure Secure Boot for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled

metadata.description: Enable VPC Flow Logs and Intranode Visibility

metadata.description: Ensure use of VPC-native clusters

metadata.description: Ensure Master Authorized Networks is Enabled

metadata.description: Ensure clusters are created with Private Endpoint Enabled and Public Access Disabled

metadata.description: Ensure clusters are created with Private Nodes

metadata.description: Ensure Legacy Authorization (ABAC) is Disabled

metadata.description: Ensure Kubernetes Web UI is Disabled

shellcommand_test.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get pods -o=json' output Pattern Match 'seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod: docker/default' (string)
Ensure Image Vulnerability Scanning using GCR Container Analysis or a third party provider
Ensure GKE clusters are not running using the Compute Engine default service account
Ensure Kubernetes Secrets are encrypted using keys managed in Cloud KMS
Ensure legacy Compute Engine instance metadata APIs are Disabled
Ensure the GKE Metadata Server is Enabled
Ensure Container-Optimized OS (COS) is used for GKE node images
Ensure Node Auto-Repair is enabled for GKE nodes
Ensure Node Auto-Upgrade is enabled for GKE nodes
Ensure 'gcloud beta container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME \ --format json | jq '.shieldedNodes'' output Pattern Match 'enabled": true' (string)
Ensure Integrity Monitoring for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled
Ensure Secure Boot for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled
Enable VPC Flow Logs and Intranode Visibility
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.ipAllocationPolicy.useIpAliases'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuthorizedNetworksConfig'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure clusters are created with Private Endpoint Enabled and Public Access Disabled
Ensure clusters are created with Private Nodes
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.networkPolicy'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure Stackdriver Kubernetes Logging and Monitoring is Enabled
Ensure Stackdriver Kubernetes Logging and Monitoring is Enabled
Ensure Basic Authentication using static passwords is Disabled
Ensure authentication using Client Certificates is Disabled
Ensure Legacy Authorization (ABAC) is Disabled
Ensure Kubernetes Web UI is Disabled
Ensure that Alpha clusters are not used for production workloads
Ensure Pod Security Policy is Enabled and set as appropriate
Ensure use of Binary Authorization

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get pods -o=json' output Pattern Match 'seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod: docker/default' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: kubectl get pods -o=json

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Image Vulnerability Scanning using GCR Container Analysis or a third party provider
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud services list --enabled --filter containerregistry

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure GKE clusters are not running using the Compute Engine default service account
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.config.serviceAccount'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Kubernetes Secrets are encrypted using keys managed in Cloud KMS
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.databaseEncryption'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure legacy Compute Engine instance metadata APIs are Disabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.nodePools[].config.metadata'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure the GKE Metadata Server is Enabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $CLUSTER_ZONE --format json | jq '.nodePools[].config.workloadMetadataConfig'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Container-Optimized OS (COS) is used for GKE node images
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.config.imageType'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Node Auto-Repair is enabled for GKE nodes
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $POOL_NAME --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.management'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Node Auto-Upgrade is enabled for GKE nodes
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $POOL_NAME --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.management'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud beta container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME \ --format json | jq '.shieldedNodes'' output Pattern Match 'enabled": true' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud beta container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME \ --format json | jq '.shieldedNodes'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Integrity Monitoring for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud beta container node-pools describe $POOL_NAME --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .config.shieldedInstanceConfig

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Secure Boot for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud beta container node-pools describe $POOL_NAME --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .config.shieldedInstanceConfig

shellcommand_object.comment: Enable VPC Flow Logs and Intranode Visibility
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud beta container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.networkConfig.enableIntraNodeVisibility'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.ipAllocationPolicy.useIpAliases'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.ipAllocationPolicy.useIpAliases'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuthorizedNetworksConfig'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuthorizedNetworksConfig'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure clusters are created with Private Endpoint Enabled and Public Access Disabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.privateClusterConfig.enablePrivateEndpoint'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure clusters are created with Private Nodes
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.privateClusterConfig.enablePrivateNodes'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.networkPolicy'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.networkPolicy'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Stackdriver Kubernetes Logging and Monitoring is Enabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.loggingService'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Stackdriver Kubernetes Logging and Monitoring is Enabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.monitoringService'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Basic Authentication using static passwords is Disabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuth.password and .masterAuth.username'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure authentication using Client Certificates is Disabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuth.clientKey'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Legacy Authorization (ABAC) is Disabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.legacyAbac'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Kubernetes Web UI is Disabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.addonsConfig.kubernetesDashboard'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure that Alpha clusters are not used for production workloads
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.enableKubernetesAlpha'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Pod Security Policy is Enabled and set as appropriate
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud beta container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.podSecurityPolicyConfig'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure use of Binary Authorization
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .binaryAuthorization

shellcommand_state.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get pods -o=json' output Pattern Match 'seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod: docker/default' (string)
Ensure Image Vulnerability Scanning using GCR Container Analysis or a third party provider
Ensure GKE clusters are not running using the Compute Engine default service account
Ensure Kubernetes Secrets are encrypted using keys managed in Cloud KMS
Ensure legacy Compute Engine instance metadata APIs are Disabled
Ensure the GKE Metadata Server is Enabled
Ensure Container-Optimized OS (COS) is used for GKE node images
Ensure Node Auto-Repair is enabled for GKE nodes
Ensure Node Auto-Upgrade is enabled for GKE nodes
Ensure 'gcloud beta container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME \ --format json | jq '.shieldedNodes'' output Pattern Match 'enabled": true' (string)
Ensure Integrity Monitoring for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled
Ensure Secure Boot for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled
Enable VPC Flow Logs and Intranode Visibility
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.ipAllocationPolicy.useIpAliases'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuthorizedNetworksConfig'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure clusters are created with Private Endpoint Enabled and Public Access Disabled
Ensure clusters are created with Private Nodes
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.networkPolicy'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure Stackdriver Kubernetes Logging and Monitoring is Enabled
Ensure Stackdriver Kubernetes Logging and Monitoring is Enabled
Ensure Basic Authentication using static passwords is Disabled
Ensure authentication using Client Certificates is Disabled
Ensure Legacy Authorization (ABAC) is Disabled
Ensure Kubernetes Web UI is Disabled
Ensure that Alpha clusters are not used for production workloads
Ensure Pod Security Policy is Enabled and set as appropriate
Ensure use of Binary Authorization
